com.adobe.fd.ccm.multichannel.batch.api.builder

Interface BatchConfigBuilder


  • public interface BatchConfigBuilder
    Builder to construct the immutable @BatchConfig instance

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BatchConfig build()
      Build the immutable Batch Config instance
      BatchConfigBuilder setBatchType(BatchType batchType)
      Set the batch type to be used for rendering
      BatchConfigBuilder setLocale(String locale)
      Set the locale to be used while rendering the document
      BatchConfigBuilder setPostProcessor(PostProcessor postProcessor)
      Configure the post-processor to be executed after executing batch logic.
      BatchConfigBuilder setPreProcessor(PreProcessor preProcessor)
      Configure the pre-processor to be executed before actual executing batch logic.
      BatchConfigBuilder setRecordPath(String recordID)
      Set the record Id ie json pointer to the data, to uniquely identify in Result after batch execution.The provided json-pointer will be resolved from input data.
      BatchConfigBuilder setUsePrefillService(boolean usePrefillService)
      Configuration to either use input data as argument and use prefill service defined on IC or ignore prefill service provided in IC and use complete input as actual data.

      • setRecordPath

        BatchConfigBuilder setRecordPath(String recordID)
        Set the record Id ie json pointer to the data, to uniquely identify in Result after batch execution.The provided json-pointer will be resolved from input data. eg /account/id
        Parameters:
        recordID - json pointer to the data
        Returns:
        Batch Config Builder

      • setUsePrefillService

        BatchConfigBuilder setUsePrefillService(boolean usePrefillService)
        Configuration to either use input data as argument and use prefill service defined on IC or ignore prefill service provided in IC and use complete input as actual data. If false then use use input as actual data adn ignore prefill service, true then use prefill service defined on IC and use input as arguments.
        Parameters:
        usePrefillService -
        Returns:
        Batch Config Builder

           throws BatchException
        Build the immutable Batch Config instance
        Returns:
        the Batch Config instance
        Throws:
        BatchException
